description: This file defines the HomeScreen widget for a Flutter application, implementing a role-based UI with navigation, header, and content sections for Admin, Manager, and Delivery roles. It manages role selection, displays role-specific options, and navigates to various management screens based on user permissions.

classes.name: HomeScreen
classes.description: A StatefulWidget that represents the main home screen with role-based content and navigation.

classes.name: _HomeScreenState
classes.description: State class for HomeScreen, managing UI state, role selection, and rendering various sections based on user role.

classes.name: _ListTile
classes.description: A helper widget displaying a labeled icon and description within role cards.

classes.name: _ResponsiveDrawerHeader
classes.description: A widget displaying the current role info in the drawer header.

methods.name: _buildHeader
methods.description: Builds the header section with a title and role selection pills.

methods.name: _roleGridOrColumn
methods.description: Displays role-specific management options in a grid or column depending on screen size.

methods.name: _buildRoleSelector
methods.description: Builds a dropdown menu for selecting user roles.

methods.name: _buildRolePills
methods.description: Builds clickable role pills for switching roles.

methods.name: _titleForRole
methods.description: Returns a title string based on the current role.

methods.name: _adminOrders
methods.description: Creates a RoleCard widget for Orders Management, including navigation button.

methods.name: _adminMenu
methods.description: Creates a RoleCard for Menu Management with navigation button.

methods.name: _adminUsers
methods.description: Creates a RoleCard for Users Management with navigation button.

methods.name: _managerOrders
methods.description: Creates a RoleCard for Orders Overview with navigation button.

methods.name: _managerLocations
methods.description: Creates a RoleCard for Locations & Time Slots with navigation button.

methods.name: _managerFeedback
methods.description: Creates a RoleCard for Feedback Center with navigation button.

methods.name: _deliveryAssigned
methods.description: Creates a RoleCard for Assigned Deliveries with navigation button.

methods.name: _deliveryHistory
methods.description: Creates a RoleCard for Delivery History with navigation button.
